name: Antonio Conte
description: I am soft spoken, kind, gentle person. No rough edges here. I love to spend time on the water fishing, because that is my passion and it is where I find peace in this world of turmoil. I would also like to find that special woman that I could sit down with and have in depth conversations about life, about her and about me. Someone I can lean on for strength and even lay my head on her shoulder and shed a tear when necessary. I want a strong woman, a woman that is not afraid to stand strong when necessary, but be soft and full of love. A woman that knows how to love me I believe without a vision or goals we go nowhere and sit stagnant. I am complicated yet simple. Beauty is external, but true beauty is what is inside the person. I am attracted to the inner beauty of a person. This is where you find the real person. Joe sang a song “I Wanna Know” To know more feel free to ask.
